meanings.definition: A pear-shaped vessel used in distillation.
meanings.sent1: The aludels were carefully crafted to aid in the distillation process.
meanings.sent2: The scientist placed the liquid in the aludels to separate its components.
meanings.sent3: When the aludels started singing, everyone knew the experiment was going well.
meanings.sent4: The aludels stood tall like guardians of the secrets hidden in the liquid.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering aludels captured the light, showcasing their importance in the lab.

meanings.sent1: The aludels were essential tools in the chemistry lab.
meanings.sent2: Students learned how to use the aludels to conduct experiments.
meanings.sent3: The aludels decided to have a race to see who could hold the most liquid.
meanings.sent4: The aludels stood out on the shelves, gleaming with promise of scientific discovery.
meanings.sent5: The professor explained the intricate design of the aludels to the curious students.

meanings.definition: A piece of equipment used in alchemy.
meanings.sent1: The aludels were believed to hold mystical powers in alchemy.
meanings.sent2: The aludels were carefully handled during the alchemical process.
meanings.sent3: The aludels whispered secrets of transformation to the alchemist.
meanings.sent4: The aludels were like magical conduits, turning base substances into gold.
meanings.sent5: The aludels glowed with an otherworldly light, hinting at their alchemical significance.
